original_text: Under what circumstances was it credited? Was it after he was circumcised, or before? It was not after, but before!
korean_text: 그런즉 그것이 어떻게 여겨졌느냐 할례시냐 무할례시냐 할례시가 아니요 무할례시니라

sentences.original_text: Under what circumstances was it credited?
Was it after he was circumcised, or before?
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 할례를 받은 후였습니까, 아니면 전입니까?

sentences.original_text: It was not after, but before!
